title: CDC Director: U.S. Hospitals Should Use 'Index Of Suspicion' With Ebola
teaser: Robert Siegel talks to Tom Frieden, director of the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, about CDC efforts to slow the virus' spread and the likelihood of more domestic Ebola cases.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
